notes:
## Shady Loader - Version 2.8a
**Note: remember to copy `shady-loader.dat` as well**
Changelog:
- Lua: removed desync warning message
- Lua: `print()` now shows on Release version (use this to make your own desync warning)
- Loader: added paging with left and right arrows keys.
- Loader: inner filename in zip packages are now read as utf-8 (since it is what windows 10 does)
- Loader: mod update can now detect a folder and extract to it. (only in manual update)
- Loader: added th123intl integration
- some other fixes
